nodes.body: dge slong du sgrub pa’i cho ga = bsnyen par rdzogs pa’i cho ga. Ex: Rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i cho ga ma nor don gsal (W21021).
nodes.title: About Ritual for imparting the vows of a fully-ordained monk
